name: British in Europe
goal: We are a coalition of UK citizens groups with members in countries across the EU. We number around 35,000 members. We aim to secure and maintain our full bundle of EU rights after Brexit.
interests: Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
euInitiatives:
Brexit: Article 50 negotiations between the EU and the UK.
Joint Report from the EU-UK Negotiators on phase 1 negotiations
Draft EU-UK Withdrawal Agreement
The EU citizenship proposal for UK nationals from Guy Verhofstadt and Charles Goerens
